question:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.
You stayed with your friend and by mistake carried home one of his objects. Write a
letter and explain:
- How you enjoyed staying with your friend.
- Explain the object which you brought with you by mistake and explain how the
mistake happened.
- Mention how you plan to return the object.
Write at least 150 words.
Model Answer
text: I am writing to say thank you for your invitation. During the stay last week, my son Tom was having so much fun with your son, and Martha and I were finally taking a break. We played monopoly and had a nice time chatting with you and your wife. I definitely want it again soon. Let's find a place where the kids can drain their energy on their own and we can take turns to look after them. Meanwhile, the others can chat and take a rest.

When we returned home I found a few of the monopoly cards were in the big plastic bag in which we brought our toys. I guess it must be the kids making a mistake when they were told to clean up their own mess. I think we can find a time to meet again and I will bring back the cards to you.
By the way, Tom is always mentioning he wants to play with Timmy again, let's make this happen soon. I am looking forward to hearing what your plans are.
